name: Super Fugue Fighter B♭ Major Edition: Bach's Baroque Brawl
name_original: Super Fugue Fighter B♭ Major Edition: Bach's Baroque Brawl
description:
Super Fugue Fighter is a music based fighting game played on a MIDI keyboard that utilizes music theory to execute moves. Play as famous composers from different time periods in an all-out brawl!

Note that you'll need at least two midi keyboards to be able to play.
